biotools.summary: BART3D is a computational method for inferring transcriptional regulators (TRs) associated with genome-wide differential chromatin interactions (DCIs) detected by comparing two Hi-C maps. And Inferring transcriptional regulators associated with differential chromatin interactions from Hi-C data.
